job_purpose: To provide interns with practical consulting experience, exposure to client projects, and opportunities for skill development within Capgemini.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Work on exciting projects with clients
Gain insights into the consulting industry
required_qualifications: Second or last year of undergraduate or postgraduate degree
company_details: Capgemini is a global leader in consulting, technology services, and digital transformation. They focus on using new tech to help leading brands transform their businesses. With a team of over 350,000 people, Capgemini is committed to delivering transformational outcomes and supporting positive futures through innovation and community impact.
